content: do you also love mushrooms do you also wish that mushrooms would stay all year round do you also wish that you could display beautiful mushrooms all over the house do you also wish that you could cuddle mushrooms during naptime do you also want to be known as the crazy lady who gifts mushrooms to all the kids in town then join my cult - i mean get my mushkin pattern anyway this is a cute and cuddly 2-in-1 pattern for all mushroom lovers this pattern allows you to create fly agaric and penny bun mushkin plushies the pattern can be used with all types of yarn with compatible hooks so do play around i prefer the listed yarns materials needed * 5 mm hook * super bulky yarn * 10 mm safety eyes * a yarn needle * scissors * cotton stuffing
